bcbioSingleCell
  • Reference
  • News

Counts Accessor

Counts Accessor

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
counts(object, gene2symbol = FALSE)

# S4 method for seurat
counts(object, normalized = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Object.
gene2symbol

Convert Ensembl gene identifiers (rownames) to gene symbols. Recommended for passing counts to Seurat.
normalized

Normalized (TRUE) or raw (FALSE) counts.

Value

Counts matrix.

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/bcb.rda", package = "bcbioSingleCell"))
load(system.file("extdata/seurat.rda", package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# bcbioSingleCell
counts(bcb, gene2symbol = FALSE) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'dgCMatrix' [package "Matrix"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ i       : int [1:313444] 0 1 3 5 6 7 9 11 12 14 ...
#>   ..@ p       : int [1:501] 0 695 1431 1972 2517 3138 3923 4293 4818 5500 ...
#>   ..@ Dim     : int [1:2] 1000 500
#>   ..@ Dimnames:List of 2
#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:1000] "ENSG00000000457" "ENSG00000002586" "ENSG00000002933" "ENSG00000004939" ...
#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:500] "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA" "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT" "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACCGCC_GAGTTTCG" "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACCGCC_TAGCCTCG" ...
#>   ..@ x       : num [1:313444] 1 1 3 1 1 5 1 18 2 1 ...
#>   ..@ factors : list()
counts(bcb, gene2symbol = TRUE) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'dgCMatrix' [package "Matrix"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ i       : int [1:313444] 0 1 3 5 6 7 9 11 12 14 ...
#>   ..@ p       : int [1:501] 0 695 1431 1972 2517 3138 3923 4293 4818 5500 ...
#>   ..@ Dim     : int [1:2] 1000 500
#>   ..@ Dimnames:List of 2
#>   .. ..$ : Named chr [1:1000] "SCYL3" "CD99" "TMEM176A" "SLC4A1" ...
#>   .. .. ..- attr(*, "names")= chr [1:1000] "ENSG00000000457" "ENSG00000002586" "ENSG00000002933" "ENSG00000004939" ...
#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:500] "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA" "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT" "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACCGCC_GAGTTTCG" "run1_AGAGGATA_AAACCGCC_TAGCCTCG" ...
#>   ..@ x       : num [1:313444] 1 1 3 1 1 5 1 18 2 1 ...
#>   ..@ factors : list()

#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:243] "M1_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA" "M1_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT" "M1_AAACCGCC_GAGTTTCG" "M1_AAACCGCC_TAGCCTCG" ...
#>   ..@ x       : num [1:165242] 1 3 7 3 1 10 2 33 4 2 ...
#>   ..@ factors : list()
